channel.title: Food/prayer rudeness
channel.description:
okay so i am a pker a mini gamer and i play alot of thing that have to do with prayer and food well when i go pking i go in f2p and p2p and both worlds i can insulted people calling me a newb, nub,noob and other things because i use it.
what i am trying to say is why do they do it, it is one of jagexs things they put and i don't like to be insulted buy players who don't use prayer just because they can't or don't want to.
and when i am at dual arena i will stake something and they will to so i sometime use food if it is good and i got flamed but people calling me a safer a noob a newb a nub etc. why can't people just have fun and if they don't like it then don't fight them or talk to them or go get the same thing then fight. thats all

item.title: Food/prayer rudeness
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

Don’t take things people say so personally. Its the internet, you’re always going to run into some kind of moron who wants to tick people off. Ignore them, enjoy the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Food/prayer rudeness
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

alex4ever:

ya but remember it can only hold so much and i try that one time and it god full and i had to take someone off and the min i take them off i am getting flamed

turn private chat off.

Read full topic

item.title: Food/prayer rudeness
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

Make your game play much less stressful on your life and just ignore them, the ignore list can do wonders.
